summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement for these scrapers to adhere to the robots.txt protocol and acknowledges that a rate limit has been imposed on a specific IP address. It directs users to the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service for alternative access to public data. The central focus is on responsible data collection practices and the availability of government data, suggesting the bill is likely targeting the actions of automated tools and users trying to access datasets.
